sentences.english: You must conquer your fear of height.
Do you know how to overcome acrophobia.
sentences.chinese: 你知道怎么才能克服恐高症。

sentences.english: Common ones include fear of flying, fear of heights and fear of public speaking.
sentences.chinese: 常见的包括恐飞症，恐高症和害怕公众演说。

sentences.english: Bernd_Schneider: The same with the really visible, acrophobia and Arachnophobia.
sentences.chinese: 和真的可以看见的东西一样，恐高症或者食蜘蛛的。

sentences.english: The walk in the mountains confirmed his fear of heights.
sentences.chinese: 在山里步行使他确信自己有恐高症。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Ryan also suffers from acrophobia.
sentences.chinese: 同时，瑞安也得克服他的恐高症。

sentences.english: Do you know how to overcome acrophobia ?
sentences.chinese: 你说怎么才能克服恐高症呢？

sentences.english: When we were on the Ferris wheel, I discovered my fear of heights.
sentences.chinese: 当我们坐摩天轮的时候，我发现我有恐高症。

sentences.english: If you re afraid of heights, or if it s a windy day, you can forget the climb.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有恐高症，或者当天风很大，那就免了吧。

sentences.english: His son, Jack, didn't want to get the cat down because he had acrophobia .
sentences.chinese: 他的儿子，杰克不能把猫抓下来，因为他有恐高症。

sentences.english: Li Lei Do you know how to overcome acrophobia ?
sentences.chinese: 你说怎么才能克服恐高症呢？

sentences.english: Ada was able to surmount her fear of heights by learning to rock climb.
sentences.chinese: 学会攀岩后，艾达终于克服了恐高症。

sentences.english: She has acrophobia and always becomes dizzy in a high-rise elevator.
sentences.chinese: 她有恐高症，到了高楼的电梯里就发晕。

sentences.english: If you're afraid of heights, or if its a windy day, you can forget the climb.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有恐高症，或者当天风很大，那就免了吧。

sentences.english: Many people suffer from very serious acrophobia.
sentences.chinese: 许多人患有严重的恐高症。

definition: altitude sickness/acute mountain sickness/abbr. to 高反[gao1 fan3]
